## RestApiWithSpecProps.newRestApi property

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Factory method of a [aws\_apigateway.RestApi](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/cdk/api/v2/docs/aws-cdk-lib.aws_apigateway.RestApi.html) construct.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
newRestApi?: RestApiFactory;
```

## Remarks

An instance of [aws\_apigateway.RestApi](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/cdk/api/v2/docs/aws-cdk-lib.aws_apigateway.RestApi.html) will be created if omitted.
